transformations.name: mappedEmailRecipients
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RawEmailRecipient
RawEmailRecipient derive(er_id = toString(byName('id')),
		er_recipient_id = toString(byName('recipient_id')),
		er_email_id = toString(byName('email_id')),
		er_status = toString(byName('status')),
		er_created_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_updated_at = toString(byName('updated_at')),
		er_through_list = toString(byName('through_list')),
		er_read_delay = toString(byName('read_delay')),
		er_mailbox_message_id = toString(byName('mailbox_message_id')),
		er_is_read = toString(byName('is_read')),
		er_read_time = toString(byName('read_time')),
		er_delivered_date = toString(byName('delivered_date'))) ~> mappedEmailRecipients
EmailsRecipientsByEmails select(mapColumn(
		er_id,
		er_recipient_id = er_email_id,
		er_email_id,
		er_status,
		er_through_list,
		er_read_delay,
		er_mailbox_message_id,
		er_is_read,
		er_read_time,
		er_delivered_date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectedEmailsRecipients
RemoveJoindDuplicateColumns derive(filenameYearWeek = concat(
    toString(year(toTimestamp(em_date))),
    '-',
    toString(weekOfYear((toTimestamp(em_date)))),
    '.csv'
),
		filenameRecipientId = concat(
    toString(er_recipient_id),
    '.csv'
),
		month = month(toTimestamp(em_date)),
		year = year(toTimestamp(em_date)),
		day = dayOfMonth(toTimestamp(em_date))) ~> withFilenames
selectedEmailsRecipients join(er_recipient_id == emp_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> emailRecipientWithRecipients
emailRecipientWithRecipients join(er_email_id == em_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> WithEmails
WithEmails select(mapColumn(
		er_id,
		er_recipient_id,
		er_status,
		er_through_list,
		er_read_delay,
		er_mailbox_message_id,
		er_is_read,
		er_read_time,
		er_delivered_date,
		emp_active,
		emp_domain_id,
		dom_url,
		dom_company_id,
		em_id,
		em_sender_id,
		em_parent_id,
		em_email_thread_id,
		em_subject,
		em_date,
		em_message_id,
		em_mailbox_message_id,
		em_perimeter,
		em_is_answer,
		em_is_event_message,
		em_in_reply_to,
		em_time_zone,
		em_thread_subject,
		em_is_forwarded
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveJoindDuplicateColumns
withFilenames select(mapColumn(
		er_id,
		er_recipient_id,
		er_status,
		er_through_list,
		er_read_delay,
		er_mailbox_message_id,
		er_is_read,
		er_read_time,
		er_delivered_date,
		emp_active,
		emp_domain_id,
		dom_url,
		dom_company_id,
		em_id,
		em_sender_id,
		em_parent_id,
		em_email_thread_id,
		em_subject,
		em_date,
		em_message_id,
		em_mailbox_message_id,
		em_perimeter,
		em_is_answer,
		em_is_event_message,
		em_in_reply_to,
		em_time_zone,
		em_thread_subject,
		em_is_forwarded,
		filenameYearWeek,
		month,
		year,
		day,
		filenameRecipientId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> BeforeSinkSelect
mappedEmailRecipients aggregate(groupBy(er_email_id),
	er_recipient_id = collect(er_recipient_id)) ~> EmailsRecipientsByEmails
BeforeSinkSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'filenameYearWeek',
	truncate: true) ~> byWeekSink
BeforeSinkSelect sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'filenameRecipientId',
	truncate: true) ~> byRecipientSink
